text: Mitlödi was a municipality of the canton of Glarus in Switzerland. On 1 January 2011, the former municipalities of Mitlödi, Betschwanden, Braunwald, Elm, Engi, Haslen, Linthal, Luchsingen, Matt, Rüti, Schwanden, Schwändi and Sool merged into the new municipality of Glarus Süd. ==Other websites== *Website of Mitlödi Category:Former municipalities of Glarus Category:2011 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Mitlödi
